skills.name: Javascript (ES6+)
skills.description: Javascript is my favourite programming language. I'm able to dive into an existing codebase or start from scratch. I'm familiar with ES6, standard design patterns, architecture, and have experience with tons of Javascript libraries.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: I'm very comfortable jumping into an existing TypeScript codebase or working on migrating a codebase to TypeScript. I also have a firm understanding of Generics and other more advanced features.

skills.name: React
skills.description: React is definitely the framework that I'm strongest in. I'm comfortable with very advanced workflows and procedures. I can build bullet-proof components with all considerations (accessibility, testing, variations, proper documentation, etc.). I'm also comfortable with architecting new React applications from scratch (including SSR) or leveraging a framework like Next.

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: I've had tons of experience with CSS would consider myself an expert. I'm capable of entering an existing code base and making modifications, or starting from scratch. This includes the CSS3 specifications, CSS-in-JS, SCSS/SASS, and LESS.

skills.name: HTML, A11Y, & SEO
skills.description: I understand modern HTML syntaxes. I can modifying an existing codebase or starting from scratch. I also have experience with Accessibility and SEO implementation. I'm also experienced with HTML5, Pug, and Nunjucks.

skills.name: Animation
skills.description: After working in an agency for several years, I've gained some valuable experience implementing animations. I'm comfortable with libraries like Framer Motion, AnimeJS, and GreenSock. I've also had tons of exposure to building and animating SVGs.

skills.name: NodeJS
skills.description: I have tons of experience with NodeJS. I've built complex web servers leveraging Express, GraphQL, and others. I'm comfortable writing and maintaining private and public modules, as well as building tooling for improved DX, automation, and build scripts.

skills.name: GraphQL
skills.description: I've used GraphQL on multiple projects now. This includes both as a replacement to a REST endpoint as well as using it to build out Gatsby projects.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I've built applications which utilize MongoDB and are controlled through NodeJS (MongooseJS)

skills.name: Time Estimation
skills.description: I have strong experiences estimating large projects for big brands, some of which were multi-year projects with over 10 developers contributing to the codebase.

skills.name: Career Development
skills.description: I have several years of career development experience, from helping interns all the way to Technical Leads. I enjoy meeting once a month to discuss career progression, as well as doing formal reviews twice a year.

skills.name: Client Relations
skills.description: I have a strong understanding of how to communicate with clients. I've had lots of experience presenting existing and future work, as well as walking clients through issues and limitations as they arrive.
